QuestData.Title: The Mosh'Ogg Bounty
QuestData.Description: There's been some activity up north, at the rebel camp. I just heard from a soldier named Nimetz that some $r $c up there found the key to what's been driving them so crazy. That wasn't you, was it?$b$bAnyhow, he sent a sample to me, and it looks just like the rocks I've been seeing over at the Mosh'Ogg Ogre Mound, to the northeast.$b$bI've heard that the ogres are guarding a chest up in some ruins behind their mound. I suspect it may be related. Care to fetch it for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Mosh'Ogg Bounty from the ruins behind the Mosh'Ogg Ogre Mound.
QuestData.CompletionText: Why is it that the OGRES always find the priceless artifacts?
QuestData.RewardText: <Wulfred peers into the box.>$b$bThis... this is not like what I expected. I had thought it would be a... a...$b$b<His eyes glaze over.>$b$bAhem! I'm sorry. I'm not sure what came over me. I'll be sending this south, to the Explorers' League Digsite in the Cape. Maybe they'll know what to do with it...
